import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MessageSquare, Smartphone, Palette, CheckCircle, ArrowRight, ArrowLeft, Wand2, Zap, Sparkles, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; import axios from 'axios'; const Onboarding: React.FC = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const [whatsappNumber, setWhatsappNumber] = useState(''); const [selectedStyle, setSelectedStyle] = useState('modern'); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { user } = useAuth(); const steps = [ { number: 1, title: 'Conectar WhatsApp', description: 'Adicione o nÃºmero que usarÃ¡ para enviar promoÃ§Ãµes', icon: MessageSquare, color: 'text-green-600 bg-green-100', }, { number: 2, title: 'Escolher Estilo', description: 'Selecione o visual das suas artes', icon: Palette, color: 'text-purple-600 bg-purple-100', }, { number: 3, title: 'Primeira Arte', description: 'Crie sua primeira arte promocional', icon: Wand2, color: 'text-blue-600 bg-blue-100', }, ]; const styles = [ { id: 'modern', name: 'Moderno', description: 'Design limpo e atual', color: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-400', icon: 'âœ¨', recommended: true, }, { id: 'elegant', name: 'Elegante', description: 'Sofisticado para negÃ³cios premium', color: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-400', icon: 'ðŸ‘”', }, { id: 'fun', name: 'Divertido', description: 'Colorido e descontraÃ­do', color: 'from-orange-500 to-yellow-400', icon: 'ðŸŽª', }, { id: 'minimal', name: 'Minimalista', description: 'Simples e direto ao ponto', color: 'from-gray-600 to-gray-400', icon: 'âš«', }, { id: 'bold', name: 'Chamativo', description: 'Grande destaque para promoÃ§Ãµes', color: 'from-red-500 to-orange-400', icon: 'ðŸ”¥', }, { id: 'custom', name: 'Personalizar', description: 'Escolher depois', color: 'from-green-500 to-emerald-400', icon: 'ðŸŽ¨', }, ]; const handleConnectWhatsApp = async () => { if (!whatsappNumber) { toast.error('Digite um nÃºmero de WhatsApp'); return; } setIsLoading(true); try { // Simular conexÃ£o await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); toast.success('WhatsApp conectado com sucesso!'); setStep(2); } catch (error) { toast.error('Erro ao conectar WhatsApp'); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; const handleComplete = async () => { setIsLoading(true); try { // Salvar configuraÃ§Ãµes await axios.post(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/api/users/onboarding`, { whatsapp_number: whatsappNumber, preferred_style: selectedStyle, }); toast.success('ConfiguraÃ§Ã£o concluÃ­da!'); navigate('/dashboard'); } catch (error) { toast.error('Erro ao salvar configuraÃ§Ãµes'); } finally { setIsLoading(false); } }; const handleSkip = () => { navigate('/dashboard'); }; return (
